mapper.select: select year(h.operation_time) as year, p.sex as sex, count(*) as sum from hospital_business h, person p where h.operation = #{0} and h.social_security_card = p.social_security_card group by year, sex order by year
select year(operation_time) as year, area, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation = #{0} group by year, area order by year

SELECT count(*) as sum,year(operation_time) as year,year(birthday) as birth FROM hospital_business join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation = #{0} group by birth,year order by year,birth
select count(*) as sum, year(operation_time) as year, hospital from hospital_business where operation = #{0} group by year, hospital order by year,sum desc
select count(*) as sum, year(operation_time) as year, hospital, department from hospital_business where operation = #{0} group by year, hospital, department order by year,sum desc
